arts.ttl: Augsburg fume after controversial penalty ends keeper Finn Dahmen’s clean-sheet-streak
arts.sum: After Finn Dahmen's long streak was ended in controversial fashion, Augsburg have had a chance to comment on the controversial penalty in Saturday's 1-1 draw with TSG 1899 Hoffenheim.

arts.ttl: Andrej Kramarić penalty rescues point for Hoffenheim against in-form Augsburg
arts.sum: Andrej Kramarić scored a second-half penalty to rescue a point for Hoffenheim in a 1-1 draw with Augsburg, who extended their unbeaten run to 11 straight Bundesliga games. Bülter himself had a chance in the 18th minute, his header from Kramarić's cross forcing a save from Augsburg goalkeeper Finn Dahmen .

arts.ttl: TSG Hoffenheim vs. FC Augsburg preview: Visitors look to continue immense run
arts.sum: Hoffenheim prepare for a stern test this weekend as they host an Augsburg-side unbeaten in their last ten Bundesliga outings.

arts.ttl: Preview: Hoffenheim vs. Augsburg - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Hoffenheim and Augsburg, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
